price: Yeroo isa irratti seenanii, salaam jedhan (nagaa gaafatan) [Inni] “Dhugumatti, nuti isin irraa sodaatoodha” jedheen.
arabic: إِذۡ دَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ فَقَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗا قَالَ إِنَّا مِنكُمۡ وَجِلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: idh dakhalū ʿalayhi faqālū salāman qāla innā minkum wajilūna
